remarks: Swap vectors in an orthocomplement of a singleton.  (Contributed by NM, 17-Jun-2015.)
statement:
dochsncom.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dochsncom.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochsncom.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochsncom.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
dochsncom.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dochsncom.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
dochsncom.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
dochsncom $p |- ( ph -> ( X e. ( ._|_ ` { Y } ) <-> Y e. ( ._|_ ` { X } ) ) ) $.
